code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{userService}from'../services/userService';import{TextField,Button}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{ToastContainer,toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Sign(){const[login,setLogin]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await userService.register({login,password});navigate('/auth');toast.success('Registration successful');}catch(err){toast.error(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sign",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Registration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Login",value:login,onChange:e=>setLogin(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",required:true,error:login.length<5||login.length>10,helperText:"Login must be 5-10 characters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",disabled:login.length<5||login.length>10,children:"Register"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{})]});}
